description: Change up burger night with these zingy prawn and salmon patties topped with crunchy lime slaw.
keywords: Fish burger,Low saturated fat,High fibre,High protein,Low salt,Prawn,Low sugar,Salmon
name: Prawn & Salmon Burgers with Lime Slaw Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Tip half of the prawns and half of the salmon into a food processor with 3 spring onions, lemon zest and half of the coriander. Blitz to a coarse paste and tip into a bowl with the rest of the salmon and prawns. Mix well and form into 4 patties with your hands. Chill in the fridge for 10 minutes.
Mix the red cabbage, carrots and remaining spring onions and coriander with Greek yoghurt, lime juice and zest in a large bowl.
Heat the oil in a large, non-stick pan on medium high heat and cook the burgers for 3-5 minutes on each side until cooked through. Serve on the buns topped with slaw.
